content: first k6 with c6band the second k6 with c6f repeat sets one to three threetimes then repeat set one 13 sets in total pattern continued change to 4 5mm needles row 1 buttonhole row k2 p2 k2 2 times p1 double yarn over k2tog k1 p2 k2 6 times p1 double yarn over k2tog k1 p2 k2 2 times row 2 p2 k2 p2 2 times knit first yarn over drop second yarn over k1 p2 k2 6 times p2 knit first yarn over drop second yarn over k1 p2 k2 2 times p2 row 3 k2 p2 k2 2 times p1 purl into the buttonhole k2 p2 k2 6 times p1 purl into the buttonhole k2 p2 k2 2 times row 4 p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row row 5 k2 *p2 k2 repeat from * to end of row row 6 p2 *k2 p2 repeat from * to end of row repeat row 5 and 6 three times 12 row of ribbing in total ending with a wrong side row cast off in pattern sew in ends and add buttons disclaimer this is my first time of writing a pattern i have done so by request if you have any questions in relation to the pattern please contact me on ravelry missyirwing
